amendment.description: Amendment exempts for one year certain audit requirements for banks with less than $5 million in student loans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 19 in the Congressional Record of July 31, 1995, to exempt for one year certain audit requirements for banks with less than $5 million in student loans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ewing amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
